tagline.title: BALI HORSE RIDING AND SPA TOUR PACKAGES IS AMAZING EXPERIENCE WE OFFER BY RIDING A HORSE AND CONTINUE TO ENJOY OUR SPA PACKAGES
tagline.text: BALI HORSE RIDING AND SPA TOUR PACKAGES IS AMAZING EXPERIENCE WE OFFER BY RIDING A HORSE AND CONTINUE TO ENJOY OUR SPA PACKAGES
tagline.html: BALI HORSE RIDING AND SPA TOUR PACKAGES IS AMAZING EXPERIENCE WE OFFER BY RIDING A HORSE AND CONTINUE TO ENJOY OUR SPA PACKAGES

description.text: Bali Horse Riding and Spa Tour is an Bali Double Activities Tour Packages we created to make your day full of fun by doing the horseback riding tour and then continue to pamper your self with our spa treatmants. Is great combination between riding a horse and do spa treatmants. Firstly we will heading to the Horse Riding stable for enjoy the 1 hours 30 Minutes riding a horse passed the beautiful beach and see the unique daily social activities life in local village. The horse riding guide will give the best services to make you more enjoyable on the top of the horse. After finish the horse back riding we will go to the restaurant for enjoy the deliciouse lunch mwnu with Indonesian food we provided. Then after lunch we will directly to the spa provider for pamper your self with our treatmants. The theraphis will offer amazing pressure massage to make your body and mind recharge again along qwith 1 hours balinese massage and 1 hours spa theraphy. After finish spa treatmants we will drop you back to your hotel. This Bali Horse Riding and Spa Tour Packages is more enjoyable with our professional Bali Tour driver with Private car, clean, comportable and good A.C condition.

title.title: Bali Horse Riding Tour | Bali Horse Riding and Spa Tour Packages

image.title: Bali Horse Riding Tour | Bali Horse Riding and Spa Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Horse Riding Tour packages is the best option for those want to riding an horse in Bali islands. This adventure will give you an rare experience by allowed you to explore the hidden beauty of this islands by riding horse with our professional horseback riding guide. You will see the beauty of the beach from the top of a horse and passed the local village to see the social activities life. The sounds of horses hooves echoing through the crashing waves of the beach and take a unique look at Balinese life as you pass the local village. Is amazing experience you will remember for all your life.

title.title: Bali Spa Packages | Bali Horse Riding and Spa Tour Packages

image.title: Bali Spa Packages | Bali Horse Riding and Spa Tour Packages | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Spa Tour Packages we offer is the best spa treatmants to make your day like new again, The treatmants with professional theraphist which already known the best spot and strong pressure to make your body and mind refresh. The 2 hours spa tour pacakges we offer consist of 1 hours balinese massage and 1 hours spa treatmants. The Balinese believe that the body, mind and spirit work in harmony. The health and well being of all make the whole happy. Enjoy this delightful blend of massage techniques: traditional Balinese massage, reflexology, face and hand massage.

price.title: Bali Horse Riding and Spa Tour Price Included :
price.content:
Bali Horse Riding and Spa Tour Price Included :

  • Return Transfer with Comfortable Private Car
  • English Speaking Driver
  • Mineral Water
  • 1 Hours Horse Riding
  • 2 Hours Spa packages (1 hours Balinese massage + 1 hours spa)
  • Professional Horse Riding Guide and Spa Therapist
  • Safety and Well Maintenance Equipment's
  • Lunch Indonesian Food
  • Mineral Water
  • Insurance Coverage

itinerary.title: Bali Horse Riding and Spa Tour Itinerary :

content.event: Lunch finish and continue the tour
Spa finish and back to hotel

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.
